channel.title: Weather at Chicago / West Chicago, Dupage Airport, IL - via NOAA's National Weather Service
channel.description: Weather conditions from NOAA's National Weather Service.

item.title: Overcast and Windy and 50 F at Chicago / West Chicago, Dupage Airport, IL
item.description: Winds are from the West at 28.8 gusting to 41.4 MPH (25 gusting to 36 KT). The pressure is 1003.5 mb and the humidity is 44%. The wind chill is 42. Last Updated on Apr 21 2015, 11:52 am CDT.
